page.title: 04HOME LIFE
page.content: {WHAT I ATE ON MAY 21st.,1985. For breakfast on Tuesday I had toast with butter and jam and a cup of tea. For dinner I had chips with fish fingers and a glass of orange pop at school. When I went home I had cheese on toast with cake,a cup of tea and apple tart. In the evening I had biscuits and a cup of tea. On Wednesday morning we went to Aberdare to price the food. 800g Bread-31p,8 oz. Butter-50p,jam- 41p,250g tea bags-Â£1.12p,1 lb. potatoes-6p,2 litres pop-75p,510g fish fingers-88p,1 lb. cheese_30p,cake_59p, biscuits_33p pkt,500g lard-35p,1 lb. apples-24p,1.5 kg. flour-42p. This year the potato crop was very good and are the best bargain in the shops. Jill Scott, aged 12.
